Name: Maui Tiki Tiki
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
11⁄2barspoon Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : handmade maui base (taken from a six-hours cold-macerated paste made from lime and chilli demerara sugar)
Review: “Maui Tiki Tiki is a fictional figure of tiki culture: a trickster who ambushes the Sun God, forcing him to lengthen the days. My drink symbolises the character's personality: a strong cocktail, salty, spicy, sweet and warm like his achievements, but with that bitter edge.”
History: Italian BACARDÍ Legacy 2013 winning drink created by Giovanni Zottola at Nu Lounge, Bologna, Italy.
